recipesJson.name: Brown Bag Special
recipesJson.author: HrtOfTheDvl
recipesJson.description: Who doesn't like Peanutbutter and Jelly??Don't be a GOOBER everyone does...your favorite PB&J mixed to perfection...creamy smooth Peanutbutter on the inhale with a sweet sticky Strawberry jelly exhale...mix this up and release your inner child

reviews.text: This is a lovely recipe. Really smooth for a PB vape with a super sweet mouthfeel. Second time i mixed it i did add 0.5% Blackcurrant (tfa) for me it just gave it a touch more jammyness, just a personal preference as the recipe is great as is.
